roleset.name: not able to be accomplished
roleset.note: IMPOSSIBLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, possible.01. (from impossible.01-j)

example.name: arg1, empty it
example.text: If everyone else in my small town and others like it all around this great state of ours open a similar joyful envelope , it will be impossible for our governor to NOT get recalled .
example.arg: If everyone else in my small town and others like it all around this great state of ours open a similar joyful envelope
for our governor to NOT get recalled

example.name: concatenation
example.text: This is only an estimation; of course ninjas are impossible to count.
